name: Force From Stars
description:
Force From Stars is a classic arcade shoot'em up. It's like a game from the 80's that was made today. Without the technical limitations of that time (sprites or objects limits) but keeping the look and feel.

Features

  • Frenetic arcade action
  • More than 15 levels
  • Two player mode
  • Includes instruction manual as a "cd booklet"

Gameplay videos

+ Complete gameplay playlist

* Make sure to set the video quality config at 720@60 and fullscreen in order to appreciate the game graphics correctly.

Original Sound Tracks

+ Complete OST playlist

Requirements

Processor: Pentium 4 or equivalent.
RAM: 128 MB (probably run with less)
Video Card: Must support 640x480 resolution
Monitor: Should keep 4:3 aspect ration on 640x480 resolution
Sound Card: Any sound card compatible with SDL
OS: Linux (64 Bits) / Windows 7, 8 & 10
